field.name: summary
field.value: Implement order of precenence for interfaces on proxy

field.name: description
field.value:
Proxy should implement the following order of precedence when it comes to deciding where to forward calls to interfaces:
1. If target implements the interface - forward to target 2. If one of mixed in objects implements the interface - forward to that object 3. If none of above - don't forward (standard behavior for 'additional interfaces') 4. If more than one mixed in object implements the interface, then it's confusing and we throw.
More on it here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/5238442509b489c5
This is actually a bug, as seen here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_thread/thread/2e507f47dbb831f1
